page.title: 18BMX BICYCLES
page.content: {BMX}stands for{bicycle moto-cross. Using bicycles for stunts has become popular in the last decade, because heavy traffic has made the roads dangerous for children. The bicycles are made of strong yet light materials (metal and plastic) ad have good brakes and tyres and special pedals. Here are some of the stunts you can do:{"Wheelies"}is when you balance on the back wheel and{"bunny hops"}are when you balance on the front wheel. A {"pancake"}is when you go up a ramp and in the air you turn and land back on your wheels. You can stand on the seat and also on the crossbar and let go of the handlebars. You have to wear a special helmet and kneepads so that you do not hurt yourself badly.
